/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence hinting at the soft glow that would light up the street as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
